item.title: Taking RetroPie to the next level with a Lenovo IdeaPad Yoga 11s
item.description: With the Christmas season coming, and knowing that I would be spending time away from home, I struggled with how to bring some retro along with me. In the past I've taken a modded Xbox and a Raspberry Pi to family gatherings, but both of them require me to commandeer â€¦
item.dc:creator: gozar
